speaker.display_name: Dr D V S S Siva Sarma

report.title: "Learning Paradigms for Outcome Based Education in Digital Era"

description.text: <p>Abstract:</p> <p>Educational outcomes of an engineering graduate coming out of an academic program is continuously changing with time and they are much more significant in the context of explosion of information technologies. Developing higher order thinking skills and inculcate the skill of life long learning are recognized as the most sought after educational outcomes. Developing higher order thinking skills in a heterogeneous group of students in a class is a challenging task for teacher in a learner centric environment. This talk covers basics of the nuances of learning paradigms, teaching for learning outcomes, usage of ICT tools and experiential learning as part of teaching process that can help in the development of higher order thinking skills.</p>

report.keywords: Learning Outcome, Digital Era, Higher education

topic.title: “Learning Paradigms for Outcome Based Education in Digital Era”

report.title: Three-Day National Workshop On PEDAGOGICAL SKILLS FOR FACULTY IN OUTCOME-BASED EDUCATION

description.text: <p>About the Workshop<br />Pedagogy in higher education has undergone revolutionary changes during the last two decades. Traditional methods of lecturing have become obsolete in today&rsquo;s scenario where Outcome - Based Education and Learner Centric Teaching have become the order of the day. Further, usage of ICT in teaching-learning process is redefining the role of the teacher from a mere provider of information to a facilitator of learning. The event will be organized as a part of twinning program in association with UCE &amp; T, Bikaner Technical University, Bikaner Rajasthan.</p>

topic.title: Accreditation polocies - Forces to shape Indian Academic Engineering Research.

report.title: IEEE Xplore - Delivering Research Better Than Ever

description.text: <p><strong>Title: IEEE Xplore - Delivering Research Better Than Ever</strong></p> <p><br /><strong>Abstract:</strong> The session highlights on how IEEE Xplore Digital Library can add value faculty during their career. The session highlights on various aspects on how faculty can find answers from the IEEE Xplore while they are authoring papers, enhancing classroom sessions, working with students for new project ideas. The session will also highlight on how one can track technology trends, collaborate with the team while doing project/research, interpreting an article in less than a minute, tracking the impact of one's article etc.</p>

topic.title: IEEE Xplore - Delivering Research Better Than Ever

report.title: A Webinar on "Digital Pedagogy for Synchronous and Asynchronous Learning in Higher Education"

description.text: <p>A conceptual overview of the affordances and constraints of each form of teaching. Findings provided insight into the&nbsp;following aspects of asynchronous and synchronous online teaching: degree of use; the&nbsp;tools used; the contexts in which each occur; students&rsquo; preferences; and limitations.Pedagogy emerged as more important than media for both asynchronous and synchronous online teaching. Synchronous online teaching relied on teacher- rather than student-centred approaches. Asynchronous online teaching provided support for selfpaced, highly independent forms of secondary DE supplemented by synchronous online teaching for answering questions and troubleshooting.</p>

speaker.display_name: Prof. D V S S Siva Sarma

topic.title: "Digital Pedagogy for Synchronous and Asynchronous Learning in Higher Education"

report.title: IEEE Education Society Virtual Excom Meeting
IEEE Xplore Digital Library - Boosting Every Aspect of YOUR Career

description.text: <p><strong>Title:IEEE Xplore Digital Library - Boosting Every Aspect of YOUR Career</strong><br />The session highlights on how IEEE Xplore Digital Library can add value for students during their career. The session highlights on various aspects on how students can find answers from the IEEE Xplore if they are looking for project ideas, higher education, PG/PhD admissions, life long learning, authoring papers, subject matter experts in an area, placement support etc.</p>

topic.title: IEEE Xplore Digital Library - Boosting Every Aspect of YOUR Career
